verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
If toiling in the desert leaves you empty and dry,
An oasis is the house of God, where a fountain satisfies.
Let the praise begin to flow, and let the worship quench your thirst.
It's a little taste of heaven on earth.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
As we lift our hands to Jesus, standing side-by-side with you,
We get to do what angels love to do.
And as we blend our voices to proclaim our Savior's worth,
It's a little taste of heaven on earth.
